278638.「そなたも ここに来るまでに 目にしたと思うが\n 突然 風が荒ぶりだして 身の:
I'm sure you saw before coming here, but out
of nowhere the winds began to rage, carrying
with it an ominous vibe of calamity.

278639.「暴風の奥でうごめく 巨大な影を見た者もおる。\n このままでは 遠からず 何か:
Some say they've seen a huge shadow hiding
inside the storm. At this rate, it won't be
too long before something horrible happens...

278645.「もうすぐ お産の子も 落ち着きがなくて……\n 産気づくまでに 風を鎮めないと:
The one about to give birth is also making me anxious...I'm worried that if the winds don't calm before she goes into labor, the baby
won't be delivered safely.

278646.「それに 私は風乗りだもの。\n アズランの風が こんなに荒れているのを\n 放:
And besides, I'm a Wind Rider! I can't just
leave the winds blowing as they are!

278648.「<pc>よ この通り フウラは\n 風乗りとして 立派にやっておる。:
As you can see, <pc>... Fuura is
doing quite splendid as a Wind Rider.

278649.「こたびの異変は 風にまつわるものだ。\n フウラが チカラになれる事も あるだ:
Since the wind is the issue at hand this time,
Fuura may be able to lend you her help. Please
take her with you.

278662.「こうして 風に吹かれているだけで\n ひとりぼっちで 泣いているような\n ひ:
Just feeling this wind blow makes me feel
a terrible sadness...like I'm all alone and
crying...

278666.「そなたが マガツカゼを鎮めてくれたおかげで\n 声を 届けられるようになった。:
By calming that calamitous wind, the
Magatsukaze... My voice is now able to
reach out to you.

278694.「ふっ。\n 王だからこそ……だよ。: Hmph...it's precisely because I AM king...

278695.「災厄の王は あまりにも強い……。\n 今 この瞬間 そんな相手から 国を守り\:
The King of Calamity is just too strong...and right now, I must show my gratitude to those soldiers risking their lives against such a
fearsome foe.

278697.「それに 剣技では お前に かなわなくとも\n 馬術じゃ 俺が 国で一番なんだ。:
And although I can't match you in
swordsmanship...I'm the best in the country
when it comes to horseback.

278699.「お前が強いのは わかっている。\n だが そういう問題じゃない。:
I know you are strong...but that's not the
point!

278743.「空が光ってる！ きれい……！: The sky is shining! How beautiful...!

278745.「ああ よかった～！ やっと来れた！\n 何度 天星郷を出ようとしても\n うま:
Ah, finally! I'm finally here! No matter how
many times I tried leaving the Firmament,
I just could not get out of there!

278746.「あっ！ 母さん！ \n 母さんが 僕を呼んでくれたんだね。\n ありがとう～！:
Oh, mom! So you're the one who called me here?
Thanks!!

278747.「あっ！ 父さん！ \n 父さんが 僕を呼んでくれたんだね。\n ありがとう～！:
Oh, dad! So you're the one who called me here?
Thanks!!

278750.「えへへ。僕 コウリンっていうんだ。\n ハクオウ父さんが コウリンって名前を\:
Ehehe... My name is Kourin. Hakuo, my father,
was the one who named me.

278751.「僕が タマゴだった時に ハクオウ父さんと\n <pc>母さんに 育ててもらった:
When I was an egg, both Hakuo and
<pc> raised me. Now it's my turn to
return the favor!

278752.「僕が タマゴだった時に ハクオウ父さんと\n <pc>父さんに 育ててもらった:
When I was an egg, both Hakuo and
<pc> raised me. Now it's my turn to
return the favor!

278753.「あの王様と 同じ名前なのね。\n ふふっ！ よろしくね コウリンちゃん！:
So you and that king have the same name...
Hehe! It's nice to meet you, Kourin!

278768.「暗くて……とても さびしい所だね。\n こんな場所に ずっといたら\n 余計に:
It's so dark, and...so lonely... If I were
stuck in a place like this, I'd just get even
sadder and sadder...

278790.「この地は やがて……\n 大いなる災厄によって 滅びを迎えます。\n それを:
This land...will soon be brought to utter ruin
by a great calamity. There is nothing we can
do to avert it.

278811.「なぜ 抵抗する！！\n 私は この身をもって チカラおよばず\n 敗北する絶望:
Why do you continue to resist?! I've
experienced firsthand the sting of defeat
that I was never able to overcome!

278812.「それは何よりも 恐ろしいものなのに……\n なぜ 同じ未来を くり返そうとする:
Why would anyone in their right mind want to
experience the same thing? The most terrifying
thing of all...?

278820.「目を覚ませ。\n お前の剣は いかなる理由があろうと\n 仲間を 傷つけるため:
You must awaken. Your sword should never be
used against your own companions.

278827.「お前は ヤマカミヌの誇りを 守り通した。\n たとえ 国が滅びようとも お前が:
You managed to uphold Yamakaminu's pride. Even
if it were to perish, the people could face
their end nobly just knowing you were there.

278831.「お前が負けたのは 他者に背を向け\n ただひとりで 戦ったからだ。\n それで:
You lost because your turned your back on
others and decided to fight alone. It was
inevitable that you would reach your limits.

278832.「今の お前には 仲間がいるだろう。 \n 共に戦って 災厄の王を 退けるのだ。:
But now, you have companions. Together with
them, you will fight and defeat the King of
Calamity.

278836.「……コウリン。\n お前も そう思っていたのか？: Kourin...is that what you thought, too?

278838.「父さんに言いたいことがあるからって この人は\n ずっと僕たちのそばに いてく:
He's stayed by my side this whole time because
there was something he wanted to say to you.

278840.「父さんを傷つけるヤツは 僕が許さないぞ！\n 消えろっ！！:
I'll never forgive you for hurting my dad!!
Get lost!!

278855.「ゆえに 天使である あなたには\n 見守っていて いただきたいのです。:
That's why, as an angel, I'd like you to watch
over and protect me.

278856.「今の私には 信頼できる仲間がいる。\n もう 負けることはありません。:
I now have companions that I can put my faith
into. I will no longer lose.

278857.「……やっと わかったのです。\n 私は ずっと 多くの人々から \n 深い信頼:
I finally understand...all along, I've gained
deep trust and affection from so many others.

278858.「それなのに 愚かな私は……\n それをひとつも 受け取ろうとしなかった。:
And yet...I was so foolish as to not accept a
single one of them.

278870.「やっと……６０００年続いた 私の戦いを\n 終わらせることが できます。:
Finally...I can finally put an end to my
battle of 6,000 long years.

279903.「うむ。かつて アズランの危機を 救ってくれた\n その実力を見込んで そなたに:
Mhm... I'd like you to investigate the cause
of this crisis, seeing as you've helped Azlan
from similar things in the past.

279912.「ねえ 教えて……？\n あなたは 何をそんなに 悲しんでいるの……？:
Hey, can you tell me...?
What is it that's making you so sad...?

279913.「礼を言うぞ……風に愛されし子よ。: Beloved child of the winds...I thank you.

279915.「我が名は コウリン。\n かつて この地にあり 災厄の王に滅ぼされた\n ヤマ:
I am Kourin. I once ruled the Yamakaminu
Kingdom in this land, which was destroyed
by the King of Calamity.

279922.「バカを言うな！\n ヤマカミヌの王は お前しかいないんだぞ。:
Don't be ridiculous! You're the only one who
can be Yamakaminu's king!

279923.「国の危機である 今 この時\n 王自らが 先陣をきって 戦わなければ\n 彼ら:
If a king does not take charge during such a
terrible crisis, then who else can they rely
on to support them?

279925.「こいつに乗った俺は 千人力だぞ。\n 少しは 信頼してもらいたいものだな。:
I'm a thousand-strong while I'm riding. Have
some faith in me, won't you?

279927.「たしかに 剣技しか能のない 私では\n お前の代わりに 兵士たちの心の支えに\:
As someone that only knows the way of the
sword, it's true that I wouldn't be able to
rally the soldiers like you could...

279930.「これは コウリンって王様から 渡されたの！\n マガツカゼを止めたければ これ:
This was given to me by a king named Kourin!
He said if I wanted to stop the Magatsukaze,
then I should take this and speak with you...

279947.「ずっと 会いたかったんだよ。\n 一度は タマゴに戻っちゃったけど\n 僕 す:
I missed you so much! I turned back into an
egg for a little while, but I'm all better
now!

279950.「あれ？ これって あの王様のたづなかな？\n いつの間に コウリンちゃんに\n:
Huh? Aren't those the king's reins? Since when
did you start wearing them?

279960.「おかしいなぁ。\n そこら中から ハクオウ父さんの気配を\n 感じるのに 遠く:
How strange...I can feel Hakuo's presence all
around me, but at the same time it feels so
far away... It feels so weird.

279963.「父さんの悲しみを感じて ここまで来たんだ！\n 今度は 僕が 父さんを助けてみ:
I came all this way because I could feel your
suffering! This time, I'm gonna save you, dad!

279965.「悲しんでるのは 父さんの方じゃないか……。\n こんな場所にいないで 一緒に帰:
But it's not me who's suffering...it's you,
dad... I don't want to stay here anymore.
Let's go back home together!

279970.「父さんは 深翠の試練の時に\n 我を忘れて 暴走してしまった僕を\n 全力で:
I know you did everything you could to stop me
from going crazy during the Deep Green Trial.

279971.「どれだけ 私が戦って\n 命をすり減らし 抵抗を続けても……\n 結局 すべて:
No matter how much I fought, wearing myself
thin and resisting what was yet to come...
In the end, all was lost.

279974.「チカラを合わせて戦えば そんな結末は\n 回避できるよ。そのために 僕たちがい:
If we work together, we can avoid such a thing
from happening. That's why we came here.
Come on, let's fight together!

279975.「だまれ！\n そんな気休めには 虫唾が走る！:
SHUT UP! Don't try comforting me with your
disgusting drivel!

279983.「俺の代わりに……ヤマカミヌを……\n 頼む……。:
Take my place... in Yamakaminu...
Please...

279984.「私は 友の命ひとつ 守れない……。:
I couldn't protect the life of my one
friend...

279989.「これで 終わりです！\n もう二度と 戯言を言えぬように\n 殺してあげましょ:
It's time to end this! You won't be spouting
nonsense ever again after I kill you!

279996.「お前は 我らの希望だった。\n 私は ずっと お前を 誇りに思っている。:
You were our hope...and I will always be
proud of you.

280001.「ありがとう……友よ。\n お前には 心配をかけてばかりだな。:
Thank you, my friend...I've caused you nothing
but worry...

280002.「この戦いは アストルティアに生きる者が\n 背負うべき宿命のようなもの。:
This battle is like a destiny that those
living in Astoltia should shoulder.

280004.「私を信じてくれた 人々の顔が\n 今になって 鮮明に 浮かぶのです。\n その:
I clearly see the faces of those who believed
in me... Their smiling faces, so kind...

280007.「見事な 戦いでした。\n あなたが 歴代最強の 時の王者と\n 称えられたのも:
You fought incredibly well. It's no surprise
you were called the strongest Time Sovereign
in all of history.

280008.「神になるなど 私には 分不相応だと\n 今でも 思いますが……:
I still don't think that I'm worthy of being
called a god, but...

284736.「おお よく来てくれた <pc>！\n エルトナ全土で起きている 異変について\:
Oh, <pc>, you're here! I was hoping
you could help me look into the strange things
happening all over Eltona.

284737.「急に そのような暴風が 吹きはじめたのは\n 悪神の出現による 影響かもしれま:
The sudden appearance of these storms is most
likely the fiend's doing...

284738.「暴風の原因を追えば 悪神のゆくえを\n つかめるかもしれません。:
If we can track down the source of these
storms, we might be able to discern the
fiend's whereabouts.

284739.「このおかしな風のせいで カムシカたちも\n すっかり おびえてしまっているの。:
All of the Azlantelopes are so scared because
of the horrible wind...

284740.「いつもは とっても 穏やかなはずの子たちが\n この風のせいで どんなに なだ:
They're usually so calm...but the wind is
making them not listen to me, no matter how
hard I try.

284741.「おお……なんと 見上げた心がけだ！\n 風乗りとしての態度が 板についてきたな:
Ohh! You've really thought this through! Your
attitude as Wind Rider has really come into
its own. Your father is very proud of you!

284743.「すみません 自己紹介が遅れてしまいました。\n 私は ユーライザと 申します。:
I apologize for not introducing myself sooner.
My name is Yuliza.

284744.「偉大な英雄として 世界を飛び回り 活躍する\n このお方の おチカラになるため:
As they are a great champion of this world,
I am traveling with them in hopes to assist
them with their heroic deeds.

284745.「エルトナに吹き荒れる 暴風についての調査も\n 微力ながら お手伝いさせてくだ:
I'd also be more than happy to assist in any
way I can regarding these terrible winds.
I'll do the best that I can.

284746.「そっか～！ そうだよね。\n いつも とっても お忙しそうだったから\n お手:
I see! I got it. You're always so busy, so
it's great that you found someone that
can help you out!

284747.「私はフウラ！ 風乗りっていって\n カムシカに乗って このアズランを守るのが\:
My name is Fuura. I'm a Wind Rider, and it's
my duty to protect Azlan by riding on the
Azlantelopes.

284748.「だから こんな暴風は 放っておけないよ。\n 解決できるよう 一緒に がんばろ:
And that's exactly why I have to do something
about these storms! Let's do our best together
in figuring it out, Ms. Yuliza!

284749.「じつは カミハルムイ城にいる 魔瘴研究者の\n ハネツキ博士から 便りがあった:
I received a letter from Dr. Hanetsuki. He is a researcher in Kamiharmui Castle who focuses on demon miasma. It seems that these winds
have some connection with it.

284750.「まずは カミハルムイ城に向かい\n ハネツキ博士に 話を 聞いてくるのが\n:
First, I think you should head over to
Kamiharmui Castle and speak with him.

284751.「この風の運んでくる 不気味な気配……。\n 何が起こっても おかしくはない。\:
Anything could happen with these foreboding
winds blowing... Please be careful on your way
there.

284752.「このあたりは 特に 風が騒いでるよ。\n とても 荒々しいのに 悲しい風……。:
The winds are especially strong here...
They're so fierce, yet so sad...

284753.「荒ぶる風よ……鎮まって……！:
Winds that blow so fiercely...
You must be calm...!

284755.「ふたたび かつての恐怖……災厄の王が\n よみがえり この地を滅ぼさんとしてい:
That terror of old has risen once again
to destroy this land...

284756.「このマガツカゼは その前兆だ。\n やがて 草木は枯れはて 大地は滅びるだろう:
The Magatsukaze is a sign of what's to come.
Soon the grass and trees will wither...and the
earth will crumble.

284757.「私は とうに 滅びた身ゆえ\n どうしてやることも できぬ。:
I have long since perished, so there is
nothing I can do.

284758.「手遅れになる前に 私のたづなを持って\n 落陽の草原の 北西の外れにある石碑へ:
Take my reins to the stone monument in the
northwestern outskirts of the Sunset Meadow
before it is too late.

284759.「かの地には 時の王者 ハクオウが眠っている。\n そのたづなを持っていけば 意:
It is there that Hakuo, the Time Sovereign, slumbers. By bringing those reins with you, even a stubborn man like him will speak
with you.

284760.「ハクオウならば この地に降りかかる災いを\n 必ずや 退けてくれる……。:
Hakuo will surely drive away the calamity that
befalls this land...

284761.「ダメ……。\n この地が滅びるなんて 絶対にいやよ！:
No way...there's no way I'll let this land be
destroyed!

284763.「待って！\n その人に会って どうすればいいの！？: Wait! What should I do once I meet him?!

284765.「どうしよう……消えちゃった。\n もう あの人の声は 聞こえないよ……。:
What am I supposed to do...? He's gone....
I can't hear his voice anymore...

284766.「フウラさん。\n ひとまず そのたづなを持って\n 落陽の草原に 向かってみま:
For now, we should take those reins and head
towards the Sunset Meadow.

284767.「彼があなたに そのたづなを託したのは\n 必ず 理由あっての事だと思います。\:
There must be a reason he entrusted you with
them. I'm sure things will become more clear
once we get there.

284768.「やはり この暴風には ハクオウが\n 関係しているようですね。\n 急いで 落:
As I thought, it seems Hakuo has a connection
to these storms. Let's hurry to that stone
monument in the Sunset Meadow.

284770.「マガツカゼは この石碑から\n 吹いてきていたんだ。\n そして ここからエル:
The Magatsukaze was blowing from this stone
monument...and it spread all over Eltona.

284771.「悲しんでるのは この石碑にいるヒト……\n ハクオウさんだったんだ……。: Hakuo...he is the one who is mourning here...

284772.「何が そんなに悲しいの……？: What is it that you are so sad about...?

284773.「もはや 一刻の猶予もない。\n 明日 俺は ヤマカミヌの全軍を率いて\n 災厄:
I've not a moment to spare. Tomorrow I shall
lead the entire Yamakaminu army to destroy
the King of Calamity!

284774.「もちろん お前にも来てもらうぞ。\n その絶世の剣技を 思う存分 披露してくれ:
Of course, I want you to come along, too.
Show everyone your superb swordsmanship as
your heart desires.

284775.「お前だけは 絶対に 死なすわけにはいかない。\n 戦いの指揮は 私が執るから:
You of all people mustn't die. I will lead the
charge, and you should return to your country
and keep your people safe!

284776.「だからこそ この一命を賭して\n 刺しちがえてでも 災厄の王を討ってみせよう。:
That is why I will risk my entire life to see
the King of Calamity defeated. You only
need to watch me.

284777.「そんな死に方は 俺が許さん。\n お前は 王以上の……英雄と呼ばれるに\n ふ:
I will not allow you to throw your life away
like that. You're greater than a king...you
are worthy of being called champion, Hakuo.

284778.「たとえ お前自身が そう思わなくとも\n 俺は お前を 信じている。:
Even if you don't believe it yourself...I
believe in you.

284779.「兵士達だって 皆 そう思っているぞ。\n お前が 戦場で剣を振るう時は\n 皆:
The soldiers think the same. When you wield
your sword on the battlefield, everyone's
spirits raise high.

284780.「お前が 剣技だけの男で あるものかよ。\n まったく 何度言ったら わかるのか:
You are more than just a man who wields a
sword, you know. How many times have I told
you...? You really are boneheaded.

284781.「明日は 決戦だ。\n どんな戦場でも お前と一緒なら 怖くない。\n 頼りにし:
Tomorrow is the final battle. No matter the
battlefield, I am not afraid as long as I am
by your side. I am counting on you, Hakuo.

284782.「今のは 何……？\n この たづなが 見せてくれたの？:
What was that just now...?
Did these reins show me...?

284783.「この風が続くと この地は滅びるって言われた。\n 私は そんなの 絶対にいや！:
I was told that if this wind continued to
blow, this entire land would perish! I am
not going to let that happen!

284784.「コウリンさんは あなたなら この地を必ず\n 救ってくれるだろうって 言ってた:
Kourin said that you were the one who could
save us! Please! You must stop this
wind!

284786.「これは 傑作なことだな！\n あの人は まだ そんなことを\n 言っているのか:
This is just perfect! Is he still actually
spouting things like that?!

284787.「この地に再び あの忌まわしき\n 災厄の王が 出現してしまった……。\n エル:
That cursed King of Calamity has once again
shown himself in this land... Eltona will soon
meet its end.

284788.「美しき森は枯れ 人々は死に……\n むくろが 山と築かれるでしょう。\n そし:
The beautiful forests will wither, the people
will die...the piles of corpses becoming the
mountains. This country will be destroyed...

284789.「そう……。\n かつてのヤマカミヌが そうであったように！:
Yes...
Just the way that Yamakaminu once was!

284790.「私は 時の王者として ヤマカミヌを救うため\n 全てを賭けて 戦いましたが……:
As the Time Sovereign, I risked everything to
save Yamakaminu, but failed... A future of
destruction is nigh.

284791.「ならば その運命に抗って 苦しむより……\n 死を受け入れ 静かに消える方がい:
Knowing that, instead of defying fate and
suffering...would it not be better to just
accept death and peacefully disappear?

284792.「そうすれば……失う痛みを 味わうこともない。\n ひとり孤独に 取り残されるこ:
That way...you wouldn't have to experience the
pain of loss...and wouldn't be left all alone.

284794.「消えちゃった……。\n 私の言葉じゃ 届かないんだ……。:
He's gone...my words weren't able to reach
him...

284795.「あの記憶……きっと ハクオウさんにとって\n コウリンさんは 大切な人のはず…:
That memory I saw... Kourin must be very
important to Hakuo... Then, perhaps Kourin's
words can reach him...

284797.「大丈夫です フウラさん。\n まだ 希望はありますから。: It's okay, Fuura. There is still hope.

284799.「私に 考えがあります。\n 今しばらくの間 この件は\n 預けていただけません:
I have an idea. Do you think you could entrust
me with this matter for the time being?

284800.「う うん……わかった。\n じゃあ 私は これまでのことを お父さまに\n 報:
Y...yeah, okay! I'll head back to Azlan so I
can tell my father everything that's happened.

284801.「よろしくね ユーライザさん。\n ヤマカミヌ王のたづなは 私が持っておくから\:
Thank you, Yuliza! I'll keep holding on to
these reins, so please let me know if you're
able to figure anything out.

284802.「ずっと 考えていたのですが……。\n ヤマカミヌの王 コウリンという名には\n:
It's been on my mind for a while now...
The name "Kourin, the king of Yamakaminu"
sounded familiar.

284803.「じつは 彼も 英雄の候補にあがっていました。\n それほどの者なら フォーリオ:
In fact, he was actually a considered candidate as a champion too. If he is that exceptional, then perhaps we can find a lead
in Fourion on how to resurrect his soul.

284804.「天使長なら 何か知っているはずです。\n フォーリオンの 聖天舎にいる 天使長:
I'm sure the Archangel knows something. Let's
go to the Monastery and speak with her.

284805.「今から ヤマカミヌの王 コウリンの魂を\n 呼び戻す儀式を 行います。:
I will now perform a ritual to return the soul
of Kourin, the king of Yamakaminu.

284806.「そのためには この転生の花と 呼び出す死者に\n ゆかりの深い品が 必要です。:
I require this Rebirth Flower as well as an
object closely associated with the person.
Please give the reins to me.

284807.「えっと その お花があれば\n あの王様を 生き返らせることができるの？:
Um...so with that flower, you can bring that
king back to life?

284808.「この転生の花は 魂を育む 特別な花なのです。:
This flower is quite special in that it
nurtures the soul.

284809.「花のチカラを借りれば 完全に生き返らすことは\n できなくても 一時的に魂を呼:
Even if we can't bring him back completely,
the flower should allow us to bring back his
soul temporarily.

284810.「ヤマカミヌの王 コウリンよ……。\n 我 ユーライザの名のもとに\n 今ここに:
Kourin, king of Yamakaminu... I, Yuliza,
hereby summon thee!

284811.「コウリンよ 気高き魂よ。\n 我が声に応え 転生の花の香りをたどり\n この地:
O Kourin, noble soul! Respond to my voice,
follow the fragrance of the Rebirth Flower,
and descend to this land once again!

284812.「ヤマカミヌ王……では ない……？\n これは……いったい……。:
That's not...the king...
What is going on...?

284813.「わあ……！\n とっても立派な カムシカだね！\n あなたの お名前は？:
Wow...! What a dashing Azlantelope you are!
What's your name?

284814.「ん？ ほんとだ～。\n ここに呼ばれて来る前は なかったんだよ。:
Huh? You're right...they weren't there before
you called me here.

284815.「空から光がさして そこから 僕の名前を\n 呼ぶ声が聞こえて……その光の方に:
There was a light in the sky, and I heard a
voice calling my name...so I desperately ran
towards it, and before I knew it, I was here.

284816.「その時に ついたのかなあ？\n でも……なんだか 懐かしい匂いがするよ。\n:
I wonder if that's when they were put on?
But, you know...it has a nostalgic smell. Like
I've been wearing them for a long time...

284817.「審判の天使 フェディーラ様から\n 聞いていましたが……確かに あなたの名は\:
Fedira, one of the Angels of Judgment, told me
that your name was Kourin.

284818.「国王コウリンと 同じ名前だからとはいえ\n あなたの方が来てしまうとは 予想外:
Although you do share the same name as the king, I was not expecting you to come...it seems summoning ancient souls is more
difficult than I thought.

284819.「僕の中には ハクオウ父さんから\n もらったチカラが 今も あるんだ。\n だ:
There's still the power inside of me that
I got from Hakuo. That's why I can still feel
him even when we're apart.

284820.「ハクオウ父さんは 今 すごく苦しんでる。\n だから 今度は 僕が チカラにな:
Hakuo is suffering really bad right now...
So now it's my turn to help him!

284821.「今の僕なら もう前みたいに\n ただ 守ってもらうだけじゃない。\n 一緒に:
I'm different than I was before, so I won't
ask you to protect me. Let's go save dad
together!

284822.「私も 一緒に行くよ！\n コウリンさんは 私にたづなを託してくれた。\n だか:
I'm coming too! Kourin entrusted me with the
reins, so I think I'll be able to help, too!

284823.「ヤマカミヌ王に 説得してもらう予定とは \n 違ってしまいましたが あなたと:
My plan didn't go quite as intended, but you
and Hakuo share a strong father-son bond that
you nurtured during the Deep Green Trial.

284824.「あなたの声なら ハクオウも耳を貸すかも……。\n 代案とはいえ 意外に いける:
Maybe Hakuo will listen to your voice...even
if it's a different plan, it just might work.
Let's go back to that stone monument!

284825.「この心域は ハクオウが創りだしたもの……。\n いわば この空間全体が ハクオ:
This heartland was created by Hakuo...in other words, this entire area is essentially Hakuo himself. Identifying his exact presence will
be difficult.

284827.「やはり 私のような者が 親代わりになるのは\n 間違っていましたね。今も こう:
As I thought, it was wrong for someone like me
to become a parent. Even now, I'm still
causing you to suffer...

284828.「ここから 立ち去りなさい！\n たとえ あなたの言葉であろうと\n 私は ここ:
You should leave this place right now!
Even if it's coming from you, those words
will not make me budge.

284830.「目ざわりだ！ 消えろと言っている！:
I can't stand looking at you anymore!
Get the HELL out of here!

284833.「父さんの わからず屋っ！\n だったら 僕が チカラずくで\n 目を覚まさせて:
You really ARE a bonehead! If that's how
you're gonna be, then I'll do everything in
my power to wake you up!

284834.「僕を 追い返そうとしても 無駄だからね！\n こんな闇 消してやる！:
It's pointless to try and get rid of me! I'm
gonna make this darkness go away!

284835.「……よかった。コウリンのおかげで\n 追い出されるのは 避けられたようですね。:
Thank goodness... Thanks to Kourin, it looks
like we were saved from being forced out of
this place.

284836.「さっきので 父さんの気配がハッキリと\n 感じられるようになったよ。 \n 父:
Now I can clearly feel his presence. He's
somewhere past this door.

284837.「……なるほど。では 扉の先を目指しましょう。 \n ですが この扉には ５つも:
I see...that's where we should head next,
then. However...the door has five locks on it.

284838.「ここは ハクオウの心の世界です。 \n おそらく このカギ穴も 他者の侵入を拒:
As this is the world of Hakuo's heart, perhaps
these keyholes are also just another
manifestation, meant to keep others out.

284839.「拒絶は強い……ですが この扉を開ける \n カギもまた 心のどこかに あるはず:
The rejection is quite strong...but the keys
to this door must be somewhere else in his
heart. Let's go searching for them.

284840.「あれほど言ったのに ここまで\n 土足で踏み入るとは……あなたたちは\n よほ:
To step upon this ground after everything I
told you... Are you all in such a hurry to
die?

284841.「僕は……とても うれしかったんだ。\n だから たとえ 父さんに拒まれたとして:
I was... I was so happy. So even if you turn
me away, I'm not gonna give up!

284843.「大切な友も……美しい故郷も……\n 何もかも なくなってしまった。:
My dearest friends... My beautiful
birthplace... All of it, gone...

284844.「愛するものを失うのは 死よりも\n つらいこと……。いっそ 最初から\n 持っ:
Losing the things you love is worse than
death itself...so much, that it's better to
not have those things to begin with.

284845.「あんな絶望は……私だけで たくさんです。\n もう 誰にも 同じ思いはさせない:
I have had quite enough of that despair...
I won't allow anyone else to feel what I've
felt.

284846.「災厄の王による 滅びは必然……\n 抵抗するのなら この手で\n 息の根を 止:
The destruction by the King of Calamity is
inevitable... Resist, and your lives will be
snuffed out by my hands...

284847.「そのほうが チカラおよばぬ 絶望を知り\n 失意の中で死ぬよりも……ずっといい:
It is better to die in despair than to know
the despair of being powerless...
...much better!

284849.「フウラちゃん！\n ここは危ないから 僕の背に乗って！:
Fuura! It's not safe here! Climb up on my
back!

284851.「僕が フウラちゃんを守るから\n 母さんは ハクオウ父さんをお願い！: I'll keep Fuura safe, so you take care of dad!

284852.「僕が フウラちゃんを守るから\n 父さんは ハクオウ父さんをお願い！: I'll keep Fuura safe, so you take care of dad!

284853.「わからず屋な ハクオウ父さんの目を\n ガツンと 覚ましてあげて！: Wake up that bonehead I call my father!

284854.「私を止めたければ 殺しなさい。\n 私が死ぬか あなたが死ぬか……\n 道は:
If you wish to stop me, then you must kill
me. Either I die...or you do. It's one or the
other!

284855.「本気のようですね……。\n ここは 戦うしかありません！\n いきましょう <:
He looks serious...we have no choice but to
fight here. Let's go, <cs_pchero>!

284856.「お前は 私を信じると 言ってくれたのに……\n すまない……コウリン……。:
You said that you believed in me...
Kourin... I'm sorry...

284857.「もう やめようよ！\n これ以上 傷つく父さんを 見たくないよ。\n 僕たちと:
Just stop it already! I don't want to see you
hurting anymore! Please come home with
us...

284858.「だまれ……だまれ だまれ だまれ！ \n もう 何もかも うんざりだ！:
Shut up...shut up, shut up, SHUT UP!
I've had enough!

284863.「今になって私を あざ笑いに来たのか！\n お前に託された国も守れず \n 災厄:
Have you come here simply to mock me?! I could not protect the land you entrusted to me... I was defeated and humiliated by the King of
Calamity!

284864.「私が 死んだ後も……最後の瞬間まで\n 屈することなく よくぞ戦ってくれた。:
Even after I died...you fought admirably and
gave your everything until the very end.

284868.「もう お前も わかっているんだろう？: But you already knew, didn't you?

284869.「いやだ……。一緒に戦って……\n また お前のように 失ってしまったら……？\:
I won't...what if we fight together...and I
lose them, just like I lost you...?
I could not bear it any longer...

284870.「そういうことも……あるかもしれないよ。\n でも 僕は 一緒に戦って 死ぬんだ:
There's a chance that may happen...but if we
do die fighting together, then I'll have no
regrets!

284871.「それよりも 父さんを\n ひとりで戦わせる方が ずっと嫌だよ！:
More importantly, I'd much rather not have
you fight all alone, dad!

284872.「昔から 何度も言っているだろう。\n まったく……お前は 本当に\n 筋金入り:
I've told you so many times before.
You really are just a giant bonehead, aren't
you?

284873.「……逃げたようだな。\n お前は今も 災厄の王との戦いに\n 囚われている。:
...he seems to have escaped. You are still
locked in battle with the King of Calamity.

284874.「あれは お前の妄執が 作り出した幻影だ。\n お前自身のチカラで 倒さなければ:
That was an illusion formed by your deep
delusions. If you don't defeat it with your
own power, the Magatsukaze will not stop.

284875.「今度は 間違うなよ。\n わが親愛なる友……ハクオウよ。:
Don't make the same mistake this time.
Hakuo, my dear friend...

284876.「ひとりで戦えば また同じ過ちを\n くり返すことになるけれど……\n 今の私に:
If I fight alone, I'll only make the same
mistakes as before...but this time, I have
all of you here beside me.

284877.「敵は 強大にして凶悪……\n 命を落とすことも あるかもしれません。\n です:
Our enemy is vicious and powerful...and you
may even lose your lives. Knowing that, will
you still fight together with me?
<yesno><close>

284878.「へへっ……よかった……。\n やっと 元のハクオウ父さんに\n 戻った感じだね:
Hehe...thank goodness...
I can sense that you're finally back to your
old self.

284879.「僕も 一緒に 戦いたいけど \n さっきので チカラを\n 使い果たしちゃった:
I wish I could fight with you too, but...
I think I used up all my strength
earlier...

284880.「フウラちゃんも つらそうだから\n 一緒に 先に戻ってるよ。:
Fuura looks like she's exhausted too, so I'll
bring her back with me.

284881.「ハクオウ父さん！\n 絶対に また会おうね！ 約束だよ！:
Dad! We'll definitely see each other again!
I promise!

284883.「ここまで来てくれて ありがとう。\n 不出来な親には もったいないくらい\n:
Thank you for coming all this way...you've
grown to be a splendid child, too good for
your failure of a parent...

284884.「災厄の王は この奥にいます。\n 今度こそ 決着をつけに 行きましょう。:
The King of Calamity is back this way.
This time, we'll settle this together.

284885.「できることなら その方々に 謝りたい。\n そして ありがとうと 伝えたい。:
If I could, I'd like to apologize to all of
them...and I'd like to thank them.

284886.「ですが それは ６０００年前のこと。\n もう かなうことはありません。:
But that was 6,000 years ago...so that's no
longer possible.

284887.「だから せめて……この感謝の想いを胸に\n 今 私にできることを するだけです:
So, at the very least...with this feeling of
gratitude in my heart, I will do now what
I am able.

284888.「仲間と チカラを合わせ\n 今度こそ 災厄の王を 倒します！:
Together with my companions, I will defeat
the King of Calamity this time!

284889.「いいでしょう。歴代最強と言われた\n 二代目 時の王者の実力\n 見せていただ:
Very well. Will you show me the strength of
the second Time Sovereign, said to be the
strongest in all of history?

284890.「ふふっ 望むところです。: Hmhm... I was hoping you'd say that.

284891.「あれほど恐れた敵を 前にしているはずなのに\n 今 私の心は 驚くほど凪いでい:
I'm now facing an enemy that I feared above
all else, and yet my heart is quite still.

284892.「仲間と共に戦うとは……\n こんなにも チカラ強いものなのですね。:
Fighting together with companions...
It's a remarkably powerful thing.

284894.「英雄に選ばれなければ 私は 今も\n 死に際の妄執に 囚われ続けていました。:
Had I not been chosen as a champion, my mortal
delusions would still continue to haunt me.

284895.「そんな私の 心の奥底にある\n いやしがたい傷に 呪炎は とり憑きました。:
The cursed flame haunted that unhealable
wound deep inside of my heart.

284896.「確かに 呪炎によって 暴走はしましたが\n 悪神となっていた私の言動は まぎれ:
It is true that the flame drove me mad, but my
words and actions as a fiend were undoubtedly
of my own true intentions.

284897.「ひとりでは ダメだとしても 皆がいる。\n 皆の言う通り……私は 本当に\n:
Even if I can't do it alone, I have everyone
here. Just as they say...I really am an
unbelievable bonehead.

284898.「妄執から解き放たれた 今だったら……\n 呪炎を 私から 切り離せるでしょう。:
Now that I'm free from my delusions...
You can extinguish the cursed flame inside
of me.

284900.「いいでしょう。では <cs_pchero>。\n 神剣レクタリスで 呪炎を断ち:
Very well. <cs_pchero>.
Please use Lectalis to sever the cursed
flame.

284901.「<cs_pchero>さん。\n あなたには 何度も 助けられっぱなしですね。:
<cs_pchero>...you've helped me more
times than I can count.

284902.「今は しばしの別れですが……\n いつか必ず 恩返しをさせてください。\n 本:
Though we're only parting for now...I promise
I will repay your kindness someday.
Truly...thank you.

284903.「悪神の火種は 取り除けましたし\n ハクオウの魂は 天星郷で\n しばし休めば:
The Fiend's Kindle has been removed, and
Hakuo's soul will recover after resting in the
Firmament for a while.

284904.「ですが ハクオウの心の傷に とり憑き \n 燃え広がらせた 呪炎という存在……:
But to haunt the wound in Hakuo's heart and
ignite that cursed flame...how incredibly
cruel and vile...

284905.「この企みの首謀者が 誰であろうと……\n 私が 必ず 罰してみせます。必ず……:
I will do everything in my power to make sure
the person behind all of this is punished.
I swear it...

284906.「ですが 今は ひとまず アズランで待つ \n タケトラさんと フウラさんに\n:
For now, we should head back to Azlan and
report to Fuura and Taketora. I'm sure they're
patiently waiting for us.

284907.「エルトナ大陸に 吹いていた暴風は \n もう 止んでいることでしょうが……\n:
The storms covering Eltona have probably
stopped by now...but I'm sure they're still
worried about us.

287208.フウラは 国王コウリンから\nヤマカミヌ王のたづなを 手渡された！:
Kourin gave the Yamakaminu King's Reins to
Fuura for safekeeping!

290510.「時の王者とは……災厄の王を倒すために\n 世告げの姫に選ばれし 最強の闘士のこ:
The Time Sovereign...they are the most powerful of warriors chosen by the Princess of Prophecy to defeat the King of Calamity.
Hakuo...he is our savior.

290511.<pc>は\nヤマカミヌ王のたづな（だいじなもの）を\n手にいれた！<me 60:
<pc> received
the Yamakaminu King's Reins (Key Item)!<me 60>

290512.<pc>たちは 屋敷で待っていた\nフウラと合流し 空の見える所に移動した！:
<pc> and co. reconvened with Fuura,
and the group relocated to a spot with
a clear view of the sky!

290513.「風に愛されし子が……お前のことを思って\n ずっと 私に呼びかけていたのだ。お:
This beloved child of the winds has been calling out to me...and thought of you this entire time. Because of that, I was able to
come here by borrowing her body.

290514.「私ひとりでは 生前と同じことになるでしょう。\n <cs_pchero>さんの:
If I go alone, it will be no different to how
I was before I died... I need your strength,
<cs_pchero>. Will you fight beside me?<yesno><close>

290515.「ありがとう……。\n 本当に……<cs_pchero>さんには\n 助けられっ:
Thank you, truly...
I can always count on your help, can't I?
